extendedInfo.description: If you are Metro Station's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Metro Station's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Metro Station's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Metro Station's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)--------------------------------Main Features --------------------------------- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics--------------------------------List of albums --------------------------------- Metro Station--------------------------------List of lyrics --------------------------------- California- Comin' Around- Control- Disco- Goodnight And Goodbye- Kelsey- Now That We're Done- Seventeen Forever- Shake It- Tell Me What To Do- The Love That Left You To Die- True To Me- Wish We Were Older
